title: Tokusou Kihei Dorvack (Special Powered Armor Troop Dorvack)
synopsis: When aliens invade Earth, Triple Command, led by fearless Masato Mugen, is placed in charge of defense. Masato is aided by Frenchman Pierre Bonaparte and Japanese-American girl Loui Oberon.
staff: [['Shimizu, Katsunori', ['Sound Director']], ['Hamatsu, Mamoru', ['Episode Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Kamijou, Osamu', ['Episode Director', ' Storyboard', ' Animation Director', ' Character Design']], ['Yoshida, Hiroshi', ['Episode Director', ' Storyboard']]]
